critique: This document is an executive order regarding land use. It withdraws a specific tract of land for use by the Forest Service. There's no clear indication of ideological tilt, immigration policy, executive power expansion, or impacts on national security vs. civil liberties. It seems to have a slight impact on federalism, as it involves federal land management, and a very slight impact on economic regulation, as it designates land use. There's no discernible impact on social inclusion.
